description: Cole has called a meeting with fellow teacher Gavin, she has had complaints about him and plans to teach him a lesson he won't soon forget! This is what she loves; disciplining the men in her life...tying their hands, making them helpless and punishing their bodies, especially their cock and balls! Her own body oozes sex, she knows he wants her so she strips, teases him and violates his ass.
title: Cole Conners and Gavin
